text-node.description: Authorizes a payment using WorldPay. The payment is authorized by using the WorldPay processor only and setting the order no as the transaction ID. Customizations may use other processors and custom logic to authorize credit card payment.

pipelet-node.custom-name: Just set transaction ID and processor

key-binding.alias: dw.system.Logger.error("$$$ WorldPay Error for OrderNumber: " + OrderNo + " is - " + worldpayError)

text-node.description: This pipeline will send email to admins in case of Worldpay failure
